thread.title: Melissa Meixsell

author: Melissa Meixsell
title: Melissa Meixsell
text: I found Trusted Housesitters when trying to find the best option for my dog when I was planning a trip. She is very shy and has trouble trusting anyone. I rescued her from the SPCA and she was not doing well there. She was so scared and it was very overwhelming for her so I knew I couldn't use a kennel to go away. I came upon this website and I'm so happy I did. I've already told everyone how much I love it!
